newsitem.title: USA: Mikohn says exterior margins increasing.
newsitem.headline: Mikohn says exterior margins increasing.

text.p: Mikohn Gaming Corp said Tuesday profit margins, especially in exterior signs, are increasing.

Mikohn said in a statement growth in its core interior signage business primarily reflected casino remodeling and refurbishing. Mikohn said second quarter gross margins were 37.6 percent, compared with 36.5 percent in the first quarter, and 34.3 percent in the year-ago second quarter.
Mikohn posted profits of $852,000, or $0.09 a share, for its second quarter, ended June 30, compared with $94,000, or $0.01 a share in the comparable year-ago period.
Revenues were $25.8 million compared with $23 million in the year-ago period.
